Package elements

Class SpotLight

java.lang.Object
elements.Light
elements.PointLight
elements.SpotLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
LightSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImprovedSpot
public class SpotLight
extends PointLight
PointLight class represents models point light source with direction such as a luxo lamp. The attenuation by distance is represented by 3 parameters: kC,kL,kQ for constant, linear and squared.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpotLight

      public SpotLight​(Color intensity, Point3D position, Vector direction, double kC, double kL, double kQ)
      constructor
      Parameters:
      intensity - the intensity of color of the PointLight
      position - the position of the point light
      direction - the direction of light of spot Factors (kc, kl, kq) for attenuation with distance (d)
      kC - constant
      kL - linear
      kQ - square

    • SpotLight

      public SpotLight​(Color intensity, Point3D position, Vector direction)
      constructor by default, the constant attenuation value is 1 and the other two values are 0
      Parameters:
      intensity - the intensity of color of the PointLight
      position - the position of the point light
      direction - the direction of light of spot
